description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. Are you extreme enough for Baby Maker Extreme? Experience the most extreme embryonic event enhanced by your electronic entertainment equipment. Simulate the miracle of life in a way only video games can. Download Baby Maker Extreme and be prepared to be blown away.
